current_jobs_desc: Manage and track all ongoing and pending jobs.
no_jobs_found_desc: Adjust your filters or add a new job to get started.
login_desc: Enter your credentials to access your account.
onboarding_desc: Let's get your company set up. This will only take a moment.
specialties_desc: Select all that apply. This will seed your account with relevant skills.
technicians_desc: How many technicians will you be managing? You can change this later.
homepage_title: Revolutionize Your Field Service with AI
homepage_subtitle: Turn planning chaos into profitable workflows. FleetSync AI is the intelligent dispatch software that automates your most complex decisions.
no_setup_fee: No setup fee. 30 day trial. Cancel anytime.
developed_for_you: Developed for local service providers like you
from_nightmare_to_excellence: From Planning Nightmare to Operational Excellence
from_nightmare_to_excellence_desc: Real-world problems demand intelligent solutions. See how FleetSync AI handles the daily chaos of field service.
scenario_sick_technician_solution: Mark the technician as unavailable and let the AI instantly suggest reassignments for their entire day's schedule to available team members, minimizing disruption.
scenario_emergency_job_solution: The AI finds the best-skilled, closest technician, even suggesting a safe interruption of a low-priority task if necessary to meet urgent customer needs.
scenario_cancellation_solution: A gap opens in a technician's schedule. With one click, re-optimize their route to pull in a nearby job, turning lost time into productive work.
everything_you_need: FleetSync AI makes complex technology simple. The AI runs in the background, giving you simple, powerful tools to deliver measurable results from day one.
feature_ai_dispatch_desc: Instantly assign the best technician to any job. Our AI analyzes skills, availability, and live location simultaneously to make the optimal choice in seconds, eliminating guesswork.
feature_dynamic_optimization_desc: When plans change, re-optimize any technician's route with a single click. The AI finds the most efficient path, respecting fixed appointments while minimizing travel time.
feature_risk_alerts_desc: Our AI constantly monitors active jobs and predicts potential delays before they happen, giving you time to notify customers or reassign work.
benefit_efficiency_desc: Cut down on planning time by up to 90%. Optimize routes to fit more jobs into every technician's day and increase your entire team's productivity.
benefit_costs_desc: Minimize fuel consumption with shorter routes and reduce costly overtime caused by inefficient scheduling and idle time.
benefit_satisfaction_desc: Dramatically increase on-time arrivals. Proactively communicate unavoidable delays and provide a premium service experience.
ready_to_transform_desc: Sign up today for a 30-day free trial. No credit card required. Experience the power of AI dispatch firsthand.
feature_mobile_app_desc: Empower techs with a simple app showing their daily schedule, job details, and status updates—as easy to use as their favorite apps.
feature_live_map_desc: Visualize your entire operation in real-time. See all active jobs and technician locations on a single, interactive map.
feature_schedule_overview_desc: View and manage the schedule for all technicians in a clear, visual timeline. Quickly identify open slots and react to changes flexibly.
feature_customer_comms_desc: Let the AI draft professional notifications for customers about schedule changes or delays. Includes in-app chat with dispatch.
feature_skill_library_desc: Maintain a central library of technician skills and available parts. The AI uses this data to make smarter job allocation recommendations.
pricing_roi_title: An Investment That Pays for Itself
pricing_roi_desc: Stop losing money to inefficient scheduling. FleetSync AI isn't an expense—it's a profit engine. Our simple, scalable pricing model is designed to deliver immediate, measurable return on investment.
pricing_plan_desc: One plan. All features. No exceptions.
pricing_benefit_1_desc: By optimizing routes and minimizing idle time, each technician can complete more jobs per week. The app essentially pays for itself.
pricing_benefit_2_desc: Drastically cut the time you or your dispatchers spend on manual scheduling. Re-invest that time into growing your business.
pricing_benefit_3_desc: Hiring new technicians? Just add another seat. Our pricing adapts to your team size without making you pay for features you don't use.
fleety_desc: Fleety is more than just software; it's your dedicated AI assistant. Throughout the app, you'll find Fleety ready to help answer questions, automate tasks, and provide intelligent suggestions so you can focus on what matters most: your business.
benefits_subtitle: FleetSync AI is built to improve your business's most important metrics, right from day one.
how_it_works_title: How It Works: Your Command Center
how_it_works_subtitle: Imagine having a simple control board for your complex operations. Three faders, total control.
how_it_works_1_desc: Quickly input a new job. This is your 'input' fader. All the relevant details, from customer requests to the service location.
how_it_works_2_desc: Push the 'magic' button. Fleety suggests the best technician and optimizes the route. One click and it's done.
how_it_works_3_desc: Sit back and watch the work get done on the map. You have full oversight without the micromanagement.
testimonials_subtitle: Trust the businesses that are already boosting their efficiency with FleetSync AI.
testimonial_1_quote: Since we started using FleetSync AI, we're saving hours on dispatch every single day. The AI suggestions are incredibly accurate. We're completing more jobs with less stress.
testimonial_2_quote: The route optimization is a game-changer. Our technicians are spending less time in traffic and more time on-site with customers. We've seen a noticeable drop in fuel costs.
growth_title: From Daily Fixes to a Future-Proof Fleet
growth_desc: FleetSync AI doesn't just solve today's problems. Every completed job, every route driven, and every piece of customer feedback becomes valuable data. Our AI analyzes this information in the background, helping you spot trends, improve the efficiency of your entire operation over time, and arm your business for future growth.
